title: PDF → Text Converter
subtitle: Upload a PDF file to extract, edit, and download readable text — perfect for notes, studying, or quick content reuse.

funFacts.title: PDF Origins
funFacts.description: The PDF format was created by Adobe in 1993 to ensure documents look the same everywhere.

funFacts.title: PDF is everywhere
funFacts.description: Over 2.5 trillion PDFs are estimated to exist globally today.
